keywords.value: Middle East and Africa Migrant Crisis
keywords.name: subject

lead_paragraph: The thousands of Muslim asylum seekers pouring into Denmark have spawned a backlash, and questions over whether the country has a latent racial hostility at its core.

headline.print_headline: Muslim Migrants Spawn Backlash in Denmark
headline.main: ‘I’ve Become a Racist’: Migrant Wave Unleashes Danish Tensions Over Identity

snippet: The thousands of Muslim asylum seekers pouring into Denmark have spawned a backlash, and questions over whether the country has a latent racial hostility at its core....
abstract: Danes increasingly object to recent influx of primarily Muslim migrants, who they say strain country's generous welfare system; some suggest backlash over immigrants' perceived reluctance to assimilate is motivated by latent racism; tension is especially acute in society that sees itself as multi-ethnic but not multicultural.
